definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: They carry toilet waters and perfumed powders.
sentences.chinese: 他們使用花露水和爽身粉。

sentences.english: Apple baby oil and powder to the baby.
sentences.chinese: 替嬰兒塗抹潤膚油及爽身粉。

sentences.english: Baby powder works wonders at getting oil stains out of your clothes.
sentences.chinese: 嬰兒爽身粉用來去除衣服上的油漬效果很不錯。

sentences.english: Fill someone’s hair-dryer with baby powder.
sentences.chinese: 在別人的電吹風裏塞些嬰兒爽身粉。

sentences.english: To get blood off of piano keys, polish them withtalcum powder or powdered milk.
sentences.chinese: 要想把鋼琴鍵上的血弄掉，就用爽身粉或者奶粉拋光。

sentences.english: Pregnant women can use talcum powder does it?
sentences.chinese: 請問孕婦可以用爽身粉嗎？

sentences.english: However, when inhaled regularly they can cause lung damage and cancer.
sentences.chinese: 但是，常常吸入爽身粉會導致肺部損傷和癌症。

sentences.english: The nurse dusted powder over the baby.
sentences.chinese: 保育員把爽身粉撒在嬰兒身上。

sentences.english: It turned out that the Floo Powder was actually harmless talcum powder.
sentences.chinese: 結果這些飛路粉事實上就是無害的爽身粉。

sentences.english: Orchid talcum powder makes you attractively aromatic.
sentences.chinese: 常用蘭花爽身粉，令您芳香迷人。

sentences.english: She powdered the baby after its bath.
sentences.chinese: 她給洗過澡的嬰兒抹爽身粉。

sentences.english: I like to use powder after showers to stay dry and fresh.
sentences.chinese: 我喜愛在沐浴當前用爽身粉來連結乾爽和清新。

sentences.english: She sprinkled powder on her baby.
sentences.chinese: 她給她的小寶寶撒了一些爽身粉。

sentences.english: Expose him to common smells such as nappy cream and baby powder.
sentences.chinese: 讓它熟悉氣味，如尿布霜和嬰兒爽身粉。

definition: perfumed toilet water/eau de cologne/floral water/hydrosol
miliaria (type of skin disease)/prickly heat/sweat rash
shower puff/bath sponge/bath ball (containing aromas or salts)
